beer.beer_description:
A full flavoured hoppy PIlsner made with 100% PIlsner Malt and German Perle hops. 

Style: Frisian Pilsner

Malt:  100% All Pilsner Malt

Hops: Perle (German) in the kettle and whirlpool. 

Pairing: 
Deliciously flavoured foods, such as seafood, salad or pork.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 130 distinct venues!
